title: For URS, the existing tenants/occupants residing as on 1st January, 2000 shall be considered eligible
clause_text: For URS, the existing tenants/occupants residing as on 1st January, 2000 shall be considered eligible. A certified inspection extract of the MCGM for the year 1999-2000 or Courts Order proving the existence of tenements prior to 1.1.2000 shall be considered adequate evidence to establish number and size of tenements. No new tenancy/occupancy created after 1.1.2000 shall be considered. Further unauthorized construction made in buildings/chawls, and unauthorized extensions to the tenements shall not be considered for any computation.
